name: Wedding Salon - Little Princess Wedding Makeover
name_original: Wedding Salon - Little Princess Wedding Makeover
description:
The little princess Wedding will go to attend her Wedding party soon, so she have to spa and salon herself quickly. You could help her to do this, because she really need your help. Every girl is a princess so we have ability and rights to own our beauty salon.If you like, you could do what you like and be a princess. Now you can learn more beauty things from our little princess salon game! As every beauty princess knows, a good design starts with a cute outfit. Dresses, skirts, shoes, jewellery and accessories are all available in your beauty salon.Once the girls are dressed, give your model some makeup to complete the look. Pick out the perfect hairstyle and you're ready for the Princess Party!

Start with a soothing spa treatment to make sure her hair and skin is clean and clear. Next, help her do her make up. Lastly pick out the perfect dress with jewellery to match! what are you still waiting for? Come to join and start your wonderful journey now, your highness!

Features :-

- Spa Section
- Makeup Section
- Dress up Section
- You can do spa, make up and dress up the elegant girls
- You can always find your favorite from the countless pretty dresses and decorations
- Lots of Dresses for the best day.
- Huge variety of party items, including earrings, necklaces and crown.

Princess Wedding Spa Salon:-
Princess Used To go to the spa for the Party that make her fresh, beautiful and charming.
Use Different Mask to make girl more attractive and charming and don't forgot to use shower for her mask.
Lemon That are used to make wedding girl’s eyes fresh and relax.
Remove The Pimple from The bride’s face.

Princess Wedding Makeup:-
You can use stylish Wedding makeup for the bride to prepare for her wedding.Use The Makeup that makes angel more beautiful and attractive.

Princess Wedding DressUp:-
You can Design the Dress for best couple to look different from all in wedding ceremony.
You got a change to select angel’s dress,neckless,shoes,purse,eye color,eye brow etc..
dressUp your angel like never before and make her most stunning and share your experience with your friends too.
